definition: Laba congee, ceremonial rice porridge dish eaten on the 8th day of the 12th month in the Chinese calendar

sentences.english: Controlling the heat is of great importance in making Laba porridge.
sentences.chinese: 煮臘八粥時控制好火候是關鍵。

sentences.english: The Laba Festival, the day in most parts of China have the custom of eating Laba porridge.
sentences.chinese: 臘八節這天我國大多數地區都有喫臘八粥的習俗。

sentences.english: As it gained favor in the feudal upper class, it also quickly became popular throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 在封建上層社會的推動下，臘八粥迅速風靡全國。

sentences.english: Laba rice porridge was first introduced to China in the Song Dynasty about 900 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 臘八粥在大約900年前的宋代首次引入中國。

definition: Laba rice porridge festival, on the 8th day of the 12th lunar month
rice congee made with red beans, lotus seeds, longan, red dates, nuts etc
boiled balls of glutinous rice flour, eaten during the Lantern Festival
food given to Buddhist monks as alms
spring pancake, a Chinese flatbread wrap
Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 芡實|芡实[qian4 shi2]
going with nature and the seasons (TCM)
to burn incense and worship Buddha
ta-a noodles or danzai noodles, popular snack originating from Tainan
